sentence: Or Max Miller, a congressional candidate in Ohio, who White House comms flack Stephanie Grisham alleges abused her during their relationship.

title: MO Senate Candidate Eric Greitens Is Somehow Even More Trash Than We Knew

sentence: Trump last visited Ohio in June 2021 to stump for his former aide and congressional candidate Max Miller.

title: Former President Donald Trump to visit Delaware County ahead of May primary
